aors.model.agtsim.beliefs
Interface ERDFBeliefEntityManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ERDFBeliefEntityManagerImpl
public interface ERDFBeliefEntityManager

RDFBeliefEntityManager This interface has to be implemented by any manager class of belief entities. It provides methods for the beliefs management.

Since:
June 28, 2009

                           java.lang.String propName,
                           java.lang.String value,

Add an ERDF triple for a belief entity

Parameters:
id - the belief entity ID
propName - the property name
value - the value of the property
negated - specify if it is an negative or a positive triple

removeBeliefEntity

void removeBeliefEntity(long id)
Remove a belief entity when the ID is known. This will remove all triples of this belief entity.

Parameters:
id - the ID of the belief entity

removeBeliefEntityTriple

void removeBeliefEntityTriple(long id,
                              java.lang.String propName,
                              java.lang.String value)
Remove a certain triple of a belief entity

Parameters:
id - the ID of the belief entity
propName - the property of the belief entity
value - the value of the property

removeBeliefEntityTriple

void removeBeliefEntityTriple(long id,
                              java.lang.String propName)
Remove a certain triple of a belief entity. The requested data is the subject and property. All triples having this subject and property are removed no matter which is the object

Parameters:
id - the ID of the belief entity
propName - the property of the belief entity
value - the value of the property

executeQuery

java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> executeQuery(java.lang.String queryLanguage,
                                                                                  java.lang.String queryString)
Query beliefs.

Parameters:
queryLanguage - The language query. Not Case sensitive. It is recommended to use constants from each Query class
queryString - The string containing the query
Returns:
A hash map with all solutions.

executeQuery

java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> executeQuery(java.lang.String queryLanguage,
                                                                                  java.lang.String queryString,
                                                                                  java.util.List<Entity> beliefList)
Query beliefs. Please note that this is just temporarily used for backward compatibility.

Parameters:
queryLanguage - The language query. Not Case sensitive. It is recommended to use constants from each Query class
queryString - The string containing the query
beliefList - - a list with belief entities.
Returns:
A hash map with all solutions.
